data.name: About.Text
data.value: Here you can download the employee data in a spreadsheet format (as .XLS file) in order to edit the data using the Microsoft Excel, LibreOffice Calc or any other compatible software for spreadsheet editing.

data.name: RecaptchaError.Text
data.value: Oh, something went wrong with the reCaptcha! Please check your Internet connection and try again. You can also download the employee data without reCaptcha check. To do this, you must first login to the website under your account. If none of this helps, please contact website administrator.
